rooms.description: Large entrance hall leading to foyer and living areas. Designed with robust concrete finishes in line with Brutalist style.
Spacious living area with exposed concrete beams, high ceilings, and integrated fireplace adhering to Vastu principles for social interaction.
Open dining space adjoining the living room with a structural concrete column layout.
Modern kitchen with functional layout and reinforced concrete elements. Kitchen oriented towards east for auspicious energy flow.
Primary master bedroom with private balcony, designed for tranquility. Placement according to Vastu in the northwest corner.
Second bedroom designed with similar aesthetic but smaller scale, positioned in the northeast for energy balance.
Third bedroom catering to additional family members or guest, located centrally on ground floor with a clear view of main entrance.
Dedicated library/study room enriched with built-in bookshelves and ample natural light, placed in the east for knowledge and growth.
Primary bathroom adjacent to master bedroom. Designed with reinforced concrete finishes and functional layout.
Secondary bathroom near the living area, maintaining privacy and structural consistency.
Compact private gym with exposed concrete walls and minimalistic design for functional exercise space.

openings.description: Reinforced steel door with concrete threshold, oriented towards the south following Vastu guidelines for welcoming energy.
Large windows in living areas and bedrooms to maximize natural light, strategically placed according to Vastu orientations.
Dedicated service entrance with robust security features for delivery and maintenance personnel.

vastu_notes: The layout respects key Vastu principles by orienting main living spaces towards auspicious directions, ensuring positive energy flow. The private gym is located in the west to balance active energies, while the study/library benefits from an eastern exposure.
brutalist_elements: Exposed concrete finishes, large structural elements, and a bold geometric layout characterize this Brutalist farmhouse design.
